Job Description: Responsibilities and Duties     We are seeking a creative Android mobile application developer who thinks outside the box to create mobile apps for startup ideas. You will contribute to develop and maintain the apps to ensure they continue to function flawlessly across new Android releases.   iPrism Technologies is looking for a mobile Android Developer to lead the design, development and maintenance of Android and mobile apps. The developer will be leading entire life cycle of mobile android apps right from the concept, delivery and post launch support. Android Apps will be mainly content based and integrated diligently with the websites.    Should have superior experience in Designing, Developing and implementing applications for Android.     Experience in using any enterprise source control system like SVN, GIT etc.     Solid understanding of the full mobile development life cycle     Hands of experience in integrating with Web Services and Web APIs.     E-Commerce     Google Maps     Payment gateway     JSON Parsing     Java, API, Restful, 3 rd party liabilities     MVP Architecture ( Not Mandatory)
PG: MS/M.Sc(Science) in Chemistry, MCA in Computers
